LanguageData.DMSRC_Interlink.label: neural interlink
LanguageData.DMSRC_Interlink.description:
A neural implant which increases a mechanitor's bandwidth, forming speed and the work speed of a mechanitor's mechs.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Interlink_High.label: neural interlink (high)
LanguageData.DMSRC_Interlink_High.description:
A neural implant which increases a mechanitor's bandwidth, forming speed and the work speed of a mechanitor's mechs.
This high-tier implant can be increase effect count up to 10.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_MoodNullifier.label: moral nullifier
LanguageData.DMSRC_MoodNullifier.description:
An implant which decreases moral and social thoughts.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neuroamplifier.label: neuroamplifier
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neuroamplifier.description:
A neural implant which increases consciousness by stimulating neurons.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neuroamplifier_High.label: neuroamplifier (high)
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neuroamplifier_High.description:
A neural implant which increases consciousness by stimulating neurons.
This high-tier implant can be increase effect count up to 10.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroControlChip.label: neurocontrol chip
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroControlChip.description:
An implant which allows to remotely control ally mechanoids functions, increasing its characteristics.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroInterceptor.label: neural interceptor
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroInterceptor.description:
An implant which allows to intercept control of enemy automatroid, making it an ally.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neurointerface.label: neurointerface
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neurointerface.description:
A neural implant which allows to install neural subimplants.
Each subimplant requires 1 neurocapacity that can be increased by other neuroimplants or special apparel.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Neurointerface.comps.CompAnalyzabl:
By studying the neurointerface, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.
Your researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroStimulator.label: neural stimulator
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroStimulator.description:
A
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroStimulator_High.label: neural stimulator (high)
LanguageData.DMSRC_NeuroStimulator_High.description:
A neural implant which increases
This high-tier implant can be increase effect count up to 10.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Subinterface.label: neural subinterface
LanguageData.DMSRC_Subinterface.description:
A neural implant which increases neurocapacity, allowing to install more neural implants.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Subinterface_High.label: neural subinterface (high)
LanguageData.DMSRC_Subinterface_High.description:
A neural implant which increases neurocapacity, allowing to install more neural implants.
This high-tier implant can be increase effect count up to 10.
It can be self-installed without surgery.
This implant can be installed up to 5 times to increase its effect.
